# Tender for Replacement of Cold Rooms at Sherbrooke Research and Development Centre

## Brief Description

The Sherbrooke Research and Development Centre (Sherbrooke RDC), a facility of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC), is seeking a contractor to replace two cold rooms in building 46. The Centre is located at 2000 rue Collège in Sherbrooke.

## Job Description

Contractors will be responsible for planning, supplying, and installing two cold rooms with specific temperature requirements: one at 4 degrees C and one at -20 degrees C. The rooms must be designed with dimensions of 3.66 m x 3.01 m x 2.43 m (12 x 10 x 8 ft). Additionally, contractors will need to install compressors/condensers in the adjacent mechanical room on a new rack, demolish the old cold rooms, and relocate/redeploy fire detection and electrical services. A detailed description of the work can be found in the Statement of Work.

## Site Visit and Closing Date

Contractors are invited to participate in an optional site visit on December 18, 2023 at 10:00am (EST). The closing date for tenders is January 10, 2024 at 14:00:00 (EST).
